rlVizLib.utilities
Class UtilityShop

java.lang.Object
  rlVizLib.utilities.UtilityShop

public class UtilityShop
extends java.lang.Object

The Utility Shop is a useful dump for all sorts of odds and ends that come in handy. Some day it should probably be deprecated and distributed.

Author:
Brian Tanner, Mark Lee

putSomeBitsFromIntIntoInt

public static int putSomeBitsFromIntIntoInt(int A,
                                            int B,
                                            int amount,
                                            int offset)
Isolates some of the bits from int A and uses bit manipulation to insert them at an offset in B

Need an example here.

Parameters:
A - Source of the bits to be copy (they should be stored in the first amount bits)
B - Destination of the bits
amount - Number of the bits to copy
offset - Offset to put the bits at
Returns:
B with the bits transplanted
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

extractSomeBitsAsIntFromInt

public static int extractSomeBitsAsIntFromInt(int B,
                                              int amount,
                                              int offset)
Isolate some of the bits from B and return them as an int

Parameters:
B - Int with bits stuffed into it that we want to extract
amount - The number of bits to extract
offset - Where to start extracting
Returns:
Int made from the extracted bits
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
